Total
MD_PC4AA: Recruitment method used in last 12 months (based on all establishments): Placed adverts on their website to recruit
MD_PC4AB: Recruitment method used in last 12 months (based on all establishments): Placed adverts on social media to recruit
MD_PC4AC: Recruitment method used in last 12 months (based on all establishments): Paid someone to place adverts on their website or social media
MD_PC4AD: Recruitment method used in last 12 months (based on all establishments): Used some other form of paid-for recruitment service
MD_PC4AE: Recruitment method used in last 12 months (based on all establishments): Used a government recruitment service or scheme
MD_PC4AF: Recruitment method used in last 12 months (based on all establishments): Used school, college or university job fairs or careers services
MD_PC4AG: Recruitment method used in last 12 months (based on all establishments): Relied on word of mouth or personal recommendations

MD_PC5_1: Proportion citing that candidates having a particular level of achievement of academic qualifications (e.g. GCSEs, A levels or a degree) is either a critical or significant factor when recruiting
MD_PC5_2: Proportion citing that candidates having Maths and English GCSE to at least level 2 or GCSE A -C is either a critical or significant factor when recruiting
MD_PC5_3: Proportion citing that candidates having a relevant vocational qualification is either a critical or significant factor when recruiting
MD_PC5_4: Proportion citing that candidates having relevant work experience is either a critical or significant factor when recruiting
MD_PC5_5: Proportion citing that candidates having a degree or degree-equivalent qualification is either a critical or significant factor when recruiting
